string.value: Very big city depends on banditism, gambling and trade with neighboring villages.
Besides the name that is hard to pronounce there is no other remarkable features in this city.
Near the city there is racing track and sometime it holds competitions there.
Small merchants village.
Forgotten reservation of indigenous inhabitants of America.
Village lives on trade with visitant vagrants.
The population is small main part of village territory is occupied by commodity warehouses.
Agricultural land.
One more small farm village.
Housing estate of substantial farmers form village.
Large, hard-to-hit city.
Strange settlement near the crack up UFO.
Potty little town lied up from all other world.
Merchants settlement of local populaption.
Temporary settlement of plant service staff.
Medium city.
Well walled town which is able to survive in next robot attack.
Good geographic location is the only thing that rescued city from total annihilation by robots.
Small settlement which tries to survive.
Very small village.
Impenetrable jungle hided this small town from strangers.
